column4: Ok, i installed Ubuntu 10.04 last night and left it running, now when i got back to the system it had crashed and showed this error no init found try init= bootarg > http://imagebin.ca/view/PYbv_e9.html
i booted the livecd and did a few sudo fsck /dev/sda1
then the system booted back up but looks like var/lib/dpkg is missing i cannot install anything from synaptic
looks like you suffered sever disk corruption; i would check the disk and reinstall.
